languages.text: "Твое сознание не в силах постичь всю глубину той бездны, в которую Муаран заманил моих собратьев, и потому тебе кажется, что мое деяние чудовищно. Отнюдь — по крайней мере их души не окажутся в пасти Сай'лантреш".

traits.locale_text: "Твое сознание не в силах постичь всю глубину той бездны, в которую Муаран заманил моих собратьев, и потому тебе кажется, что мое деяние чудовищно. Отнюдь — по крайней мере их души не окажутся в пасти Сай'лантреш".

languages.text: "Your consciousness is incapable of grasping the full depth of the abyss into which Muaran lured my kin, and that is why my actions seem monstrous to you. Far from it — at least now their souls will not end up in Sai'lanthresh's maw."
languages.original_text: "Твое сознание не в силах постичь всю глубину той бездны, в которую Муаран заманил моих собратьев, и потому тебе кажется, что мое деяние чудовищно. Отнюдь — по крайней мере их души не окажутся в пасти Сай'лантреш".

traits.locale_text: "Your consciousness is incapable of grasping the full depth of the abyss into which Muaran lured my kin, and that is why my actions seem monstrous to you. Far from it — at least now their souls will not end up in Sai'lanthresh's maw."

"Your consciousness is incapable of grasping the full depth of the abyss into which Muaran lured my kin, and that is why my actions seem monstrous to you. Far from it — at least now their souls will not end up in Sai'lanthresh's maw."

"Your consciousness is incapable of grasping the full depth of the abyss into which Muaran lured my kin, and that is why my actions seem monstrous to you. Far from it — at least now their souls will not end up in Sai'lanthresh's maw."

"Your consciousness is incapable of grasping the full depth of the abyss into which Muaran lured my kin, and that is why my actions seem monstrous to you. Far from it — at least now their souls will not end up in Sai'lanthresh's maw."

languages.text: “你根本无法理解穆兰将我的族人们引诱到了什么样的深渊之中，所以你才会觉得我的行为骇人听闻。但实际上绝非如此。至少现在，他们的灵魂不会再落入赛·兰斯雷什的巨口之中。”
languages.original_text: "Your consciousness is incapable of grasping the full depth of the abyss into which Muaran lured my kin, and that is why my actions seem monstrous to you. Far from it — at least now their souls will not end up in Sai'lanthresh's maw."

traits.locale_text: “你根本无法理解穆兰将我的族人们引诱到了什么样的深渊之中，所以你才会觉得我的行为骇人听闻。但实际上绝非如此。至少现在，他们的灵魂不会再落入赛·兰斯雷什的巨口之中。”

languages.text: 「人間の知覚ではムアランが同胞を呼び込んでいる奈落の全層は把握できない。だから、我の行動が突飛なものに思えるのだろう。かけ離れすぎて…少なくとも当面は、彼らの魂がセランスレッシュのマウに入ることもない」
languages.original_text: "Your consciousness is incapable of grasping the full depth of the abyss into which Muaran lured my kin, and that is why my actions seem monstrous to you. Far from it — at least now their souls will not end up in Sai'lanthresh's maw."

traits.locale_text: 「人間の知覚ではムアランが同胞を呼び込んでいる奈落の全層は把握できない。だから、我の行動が突飛なものに思えるのだろう。かけ離れすぎて…少なくとも当面は、彼らの魂がセランスレッシュのマウに入ることもない」

languages.text: "Euer Bewusstsein kann das ganze Ausmaß des Abgrunds gar nicht erfassen, in den Muaran die Meinen geführt hat, und deshalb kommt mein Handeln Euch monströs vor. Doch mitnichten – wenigstens enden ihre Seelen jetzt nicht in Sai'lanthreshs Schlund."
languages.original_text: "Your consciousness is incapable of grasping the full depth of the abyss into which Muaran lured my kin, and that is why my actions seem monstrous to you. Far from it — at least now their souls will not end up in Sai'lanthresh's maw."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Bewusstsein kann das ganze Ausmaß des Abgrunds gar nicht erfassen, in den Muaran die Meinen geführt hat, und deshalb kommt mein Handeln Euch monströs vor. Doch mitnichten – wenigstens enden ihre Seelen jetzt nicht in Sai'lanthreshs Schlund."

languages.text: « Si mes actes vous paraissent monstrueux, c'est parce que votre conscience est incapable d'appréhender la profondeur de l'abîme dans lequel Muaran a attiré mon peuple. Mais vous vous méprenez. Maintenant, au moins, leurs âmes ne finiront pas entre les griffes de Sai'lanthresh. »
languages.original_text: "Your consciousness is incapable of grasping the full depth of the abyss into which Muaran lured my kin, and that is why my actions seem monstrous to you. Far from it — at least now their souls will not end up in Sai'lanthresh's maw."

traits.locale_text: « Si mes actes vous paraissent monstrueux, c'est parce que votre conscience est incapable d'appréhender la profondeur de l'abîme dans lequel Muaran a attiré mon peuple. Mais vous vous méprenez. Maintenant, au moins, leurs âmes ne finiront pas entre les griffes de Sai'lanthresh. »

languages.text: «Tu mente es incapaz de comprender las profundidades del abismo al que Muaran llevó a mi gente, y por eso mis acciones te resultan monstruosas. En absoluto: al menos ahora sus almas no acabarán en las fauces de Sai'lanthresh».
languages.original_text: "Your consciousness is incapable of grasping the full depth of the abyss into which Muaran lured my kin, and that is why my actions seem monstrous to you. Far from it — at least now their souls will not end up in Sai'lanthresh's maw."

traits.locale_text: «Tu mente es incapaz de comprender las profundidades del abismo al que Muaran llevó a mi gente, y por eso mis acciones te resultan monstruosas. En absoluto: al menos ahora sus almas no acabarán en las fauces de Sai'lanthresh».

languages.text: "Bilincin, Muaran'ın soyumu sürüklediği uçurumun derinliğini kavrama kapasitesine sahip değil, yaptıklarım bu yüzden sana canavarca geliyor. En azından soydaşlarımın ruhları artık Sai'lanthresh'in ağzına düşmeyecek."
languages.original_text: "Your consciousness is incapable of grasping the full depth of the abyss into which Muaran lured my kin, and that is why my actions seem monstrous to you. Far from it — at least now their souls will not end up in Sai'lanthresh's maw."

traits.locale_text: "Bilincin, Muaran'ın soyumu sürüklediği uçurumun derinliğini kavrama kapasitesine sahip değil, yaptıklarım bu yüzden sana canavarca geliyor. En azından soydaşlarımın ruhları artık Sai'lanthresh'in ağzına düşmeyecek."
